title: HttpUrlGenerator
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

HttpUrlGeneratorlink

Generate the base part of an HTTP URL for single entity or entity collection resource

abstract class HttpUrlGenerator { abstract entityResource(entityName: string, root: string, trailingSlashEndpoints: boolean): string abstract collectionResource(entityName: string, root: string): string abstract registerHttpResourceUrls(entityHttpResourceUrls?: EntityHttpResourceUrls): void }

Subclasseslink

  • DefaultHttpUrlGenerator

Methodslink

entityResource() link

mode_edit code

Return the base URL for a single entity resource, e.g., the base URL to get a single hero by its id
abstract entityResource(entityName: string, root: string, trailingSlashEndpoints: boolean): string

Parameters

entityName string
root string
trailingSlashEndpoints boolean

Returns

string

collectionResource() link

mode_edit code

Return the base URL for a collection resource, e.g., the base URL to get all heroes
abstract collectionResource(entityName: string, root: string): string

Parameters

entityName string
root string

Returns

string

registerHttpResourceUrls() link

mode_edit code

Register known single-entity and collection resource URLs for HTTP calls
abstract registerHttpResourceUrls(entityHttpResourceUrls?: EntityHttpResourceUrls): void

Parameters

entityHttpResourceUrls EntityHttpResourceUrls

{EntityHttpResourceUrls} resource urls for specific entity type names

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void
